amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that students' personally identifiable information is important to protect as applied to current law and this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 31 printed in part B of House Report 113-29 to express the sense of Congress that students' personally identifiable information is important to protect as applied to current law and this act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hurd (TX) amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 2 (Roll No. 411).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hurd (TX) amendment (A031) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 2 (Roll No. 411).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A031) offered by Mr. Hurd (TX).
